id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The ID of the [LD2410 Sensor component to set.

*See also: [ld2410 Select](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#bluetooth-password-set-action)*

password.docs:
**string, [templatable](https://esphome.io/guides/automations.html#config-templatable)**: The password to set. Case sensitive. Must be exactly 6 characters long. Default password is `HiLink`.

*See also: [ld2410 Select](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#bluetooth-password-set-action)*

set.docs:
This is an [Action](https://esphome.io/guides/automations.html#config-action) for setting the bluetooth password.

*See also: [`bluetooth_password.set` Action](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#bluetooth-password-set-action)*
